text: 34|37|niṅṅaḷuṭe sampattukkaḷuṁ niṅṅaḷuṭe santānaṅṅaḷumeānnuṁ nam'muṭe aṭukkal niṅṅaḷkk sāmīpyamuṇṭākkittarunnavayalla. viśvasikkukayuṁ nallat pravarttikkukayuṁ ceytavarkkeāḻike. attarakkārkk taṅṅaḷ pravartticcatinṟe phalamāyi iraṭṭi pratiphalamuṇṭ‌. avar unnata sedhaṅṅaḷil nirbhayarāyi kaḻiyunnatumāṇ‌
